website_summaries.verdict: Stylish catcher's mask that younger players will love to wear. It's well-ventilated with high-quality padding.
pros: Uses an adjustable pad in the jaw area so you can fix the fit for comfort and tightness
Offers ventilation holes throughout the design to help the catcher stay cool
Uses steel in the mask to provide the maximum level of protection
Good price for a youth catchers helmet
cons: Back segment of the helmet has odd shape and doesn't fit every player comfortably

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy but my son likes it
customer_reviews.text: Nice catchers mask. A little heavy but seems solid and I don’t see a problem with protection when he starts wearing it in game action. Also fits a lot better than his last mask. That mask was part of a youth starter set and was way too tight. He’s 10 and has an average to a bit larger head. The color isn’t a red like a red crayon but it’s close enough. Like if a true red helmet faded a little after being used.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an 11 year old. Like: the color, feels better and better as it is broken in. Easy to put on and off. Dislike: snug around the chin/lower jaw- hoping it will loosen up with each use.
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect helmet for 10yr daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter became the teams starting catcher. This meant she was wearing the team helmet. She never complained but soon I realized the limitations of viewing area and she developed many patches of zits or rashes on her forehead... Probably from years of wear... Yuck! This helmet was an investment but more than worth it. Very comfortable, huge viewing area and with a little practice she could throw it off her head easily. Well worth it and will fit her for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Barber

customer_reviews.title: Helmet which protects the face
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I had my daughter place this on when it arrived. I threw bout 20 balls at her and none of the ones that hit her in the face made her cry (thought the errant ones that struck the torso did...next buy is a chest protector). She was able to see effectively out of the mask wearing her glasses. She is looking forward to learning the position.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blaco

customer_reviews.title: This is a great catcher's helmet for my son
customer_reviews.text: This is a great catcher's helmet for my son. He loves it, however this is our second one in two years because the padding around the chin came off of the first and we couldn't find a replacement anywhere....I don't mind buying new baseball equipment if the kids grow out of it, but we had to replace it with the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for my 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for my 10 yr old, surprised at the quality and comfort... he chose this one over the Easton Mako
customer_reviews.author: Ibburnk18cnu

customer_reviews.title: Great head gear
customer_reviews.text: This Helmet is listed as a youth helmet but is actually the exact same size as the intermediate helmet I purchased a couple years ago for my older daughter. It is a perfect helmet for ages 10-15 but Mizuno used to make a youth helmet that was smaller. I decided to return this helmet and get a different brand that was offered in a youth (smaller) size. This is why I prefer to shop with Amazon, I had no trouble with the return and got my refund quickly to reorder a smaller helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerdad22

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet...but the color...
customer_reviews.text: Quality helmet and my son loves it. The only negative is that the royal blue helmet is not the same blue as the royal blue chest protector. The helmet is more of a Dodger blue. The chest is more of a Detroit Lions blue.
customer_reviews.author: TheGiddens5

customer_reviews.title: Best quality youth catchers helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son is a catcher for his 10U and 11U teams. This helmet is all you want in a catcher’s helmet. Pricing was excellent, and quality is great. No doubt this is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He can get it on and off easily.
customer_reviews.text: My sons old catchers helmet finally broke and we bought him this one. He loves it. He can get it on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: jenthebrat

customer_reviews.title: Helmet is way better then my sons old Easton that he wore before
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is way better then my sons old Easton that he wore before. He is 11U now and needed to step up is equipment. Can't go wrong with this one and no need for a thought guard with this one.
customer_reviews.author: mikeymo25

customer_reviews.title: Needs better padding inside
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this mask for 2 months and it is already falling apart. The foam is coming off because the back piece is digging in to it. Also the fabric on the padding is peeling off. I bought this because it got great reviews, but I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Young

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is good. Will grow with him. Comfortable. Definitely protective. A little heavy. Sight lines are good though and my 10 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyBamBam

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Terrific piece of equipment. Fits our 6 year old son perfectly! Most important..he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Wiltraut

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. This is his second set of Mizuno samurai gear.
customer_reviews.text: Well made equipment. He is very hard on his gear and first set lasted 3 full years. He outgrew his first set and asked for the same Mizuno Samurai set just bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look/performance.
customer_reviews.text: This style of mask just looks cool. More importantly, it does not impede my daughter's vision and the blackout technology helps with the sun, too. The gap in front is wide enough for her to put on and remove her Under Armour glasses without having to remove the helmet which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: nikkifaith

customer_reviews.title: good helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is for my 9YO catcher. We first tried a different brand that was a little cheaper, but returned it. For the extra 10 or 15 dollars, this helmet is substantially better in the design and quality of the materials. There are 4 adjustment straps which are sturdy, and 3 layer foam. The chin pad fits to my sons face comfortably, where other had an awkward fit. The overall fit and finish of the product is nice. For my 9YO the adjustments are almost, but not quite, all the way to the small side. It should adjust well to older & larger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 9u catcher loves this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my son. He is 9 and says it is very comfortable and fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: RidleySwayze

customer_reviews.title: ... little league and this is by far the most comfortable and easiest to pull off
customer_reviews.text: Son play little league and this is by far the most comfortable and easiest to pull off. Great product and design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction for a great priced and high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it after a few games
customer_reviews.text: IT took a few games for the helmet to loosen up a bit. Now it is broken in and my son loves it. Plus the fact he does not have to use someone else's sweaty helmet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neeley

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice mask. The Green is more of a Hunters ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mask. The Green is more of a Hunters Green. My 10 Year old uses this for baseball and loves it. It is holding up very well so far, and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: very cool helmet, my ten year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: very cool helmet, my ten year old loves it, got many compliments from his baseball friends . I wish it came with a throat guard, had to buy a black one since I could not locate a maroon one to fit the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: linda from Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Great youth catcher’s helmets and mask
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 9 year old grandson and he loves it. He’s worn it this whole season without any issues. It’s holding up real well and he’ll probably get at least a couple more years use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: SRD

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet out there.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the slight extra cost. My son catches on a competitive baseball team, year round. He wanted this helmet to go with his new gear. Buying it here I saved over $20 and it arrived quickly and well-packaged. Don't question the value.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: home run.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves this helmet. He has used a mizuno samurai helmet for the past two years. It was time to replace it, and of course with another samurai one. We ordered a red one, but I believe it ended up being the cardinal colored one we received (duller, darker red). Its still in the red category so he was thrilled. He's tried other makes and styles of helmets and this is by far his favorite.. lightweight, lots of coverage/protection, and it looks awesome..
customer_reviews.author: bmffzr

customer_reviews.title: Bad/Cheap Snaps
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with the snaps. Extremely hard for a Youth to un-snap and snap back-on the two lower back snaps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color description
customer_reviews.text: This is great but the product description shows it as maroon which is what we wanted and it is actually more of a cardinal red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 and about average size for his age. The helmet fit great and looks much better than the standard models we have used before. So far a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Very good catchers helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very good catchers helmet. My 8 year old used it for his most recent season and found it comfortable and most importantly, easy to fling off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Helmet - will purchase again when next size is needed.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is awesome! We purchased it for our 11 year old son and fits perfect, is comfortable and we love the padding! I will purchase this brand again when he is ready for another catchers helmet
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: says it's comfortable and is easy to get on/off in the heat ...
customer_reviews.text: 10-yr old son likes this helmet very much. says it's comfortable and is easy to get on/off in the heat of "battle".
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 10yr old great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and seems to be a great helmet for the price. The hooks that attach the mask don't look like they will last long but that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: kristyl beasley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yr old. He loves it! So easy to put on and take off in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: renee rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my U12 AAA Team
customer_reviews.text: The boys love it. I got a couple of old helmets from the league, but I was not happy with them and wanted the boys to feel comfortable and want to be in the catcher position. This fits the majority of the kids really well, ages from 9-11. I love the look and the construction. It has such a nice opening for vision that I've asked the boys to attempt to leave it on for their throw/catch vs throwing the helmet off. I'll get back to the Amazon community as more of the boys wear it. I like it though, I bought a wilson 4" neck protector as well (cheaper) and that makes it legal in our league.
customer_reviews.author: Livermore, CA

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Works perfect for our 9 yr old son
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Works perfect for our 9 yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: T.Holder

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Provides excellent protection, my daughter says it is very comfortable, it stays firmly in place yet flips off with ease. Buy this helmet, and your child can be a samurai too. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurray!
customer_reviews.text: This mask/helmet was perfect for our 10/11 year old tournament team. It fit well, and was very well cushioned. Catchers were able to flip it off and make great plays! It has taken a beating of 6 games so far, with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: B's Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Green color off.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son (9) great but the color is off. We're keeping it but the Amazon picture is def. inaccurate. More of a hunter green than a bright green.
customer_reviews.author: Thadeus

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this mask is better than anything else I was able to find
customer_reviews.author: Colin Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 1 spring/summer season and still in great shape. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Buras

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is a great product. The catcher loves it, she can see everything much better than other products that she has worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best youth helmet money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. The Mizuno has the most padding and offers the best protection you can get.
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: shipped in a timely manner at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised works well, shipped in a timely manner at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: J Reno

customer_reviews.title: Good fit helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, fit is tight on my 8 year old girl
customer_reviews.author: Andy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this helmet works great and has a lot of padding in it. much better than the mako helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Gross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! My son gets a lot of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Great 360 head protection.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. NIP. NWT. Excellent shipping time. My son loves the upgrade from his old catchers gear!
customer_reviews.author: MRMH6052

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, fits 10 year old good, 58" tall, 84lbs
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better quality than the other one I bought for a couple bucks less.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice helmet. Fits my 11 almost 12 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet. Fits my 11 almost 12 year old well with a good field of vision. Lots of compliments at practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best catchers helment on the market. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The helmet is durable yet extremely comfortable. Takes a minute to adjust but plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is durable yet extremely comfortable. Takes a minute to adjust but plenty of room to accommodate glasses and ponytails! Easy to clean and well ventilated. A recommended buy for beginner to intermediate Catchers.
customer_reviews.author: The Angles

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Helmet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this helmet my step daughter and she loves it! Also it shipped on Prime we paid $3.99 extra to get by Monday the 5th and it was at our door on Saturday 3rd!
customer_reviews.author: Cinematic Angles

customer_reviews.title: great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit heavy to me, but my 10 yr. old loves it. Very cool looking. Seems well made. Haven't used it long enough to know how it holds up, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Takacs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 10 year old daughter perfectly. Lightweight with protection
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Lara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our second mizuno helmet and this is the one my son prefers
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, has lasted one season without issue already and no signs of wear yet. Fits 8,9 and 10 year olds perfectly and actually fits pretty well on my rather large head comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: G-dau, loves it... and a few others that catch on her select 16U team.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: It is listed as Cardinal and it is much closer to maroon. The helmet and price are good, but it dosen't match the rest of the equipment we have,by a long shot. I saw a Cardinal in a store and it is bright red, not a dull maroon.
customer_reviews.author: James Thirsten

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple and this is not the purple pictured
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a "RED" helmet and it came a deep ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a "RED" helmet and it came a deep red (maroon), My son's catchers gear is Royal and Red ... NOT Royal and Maroon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time deciding which helmet to get. I coach 12u and my catcher is very happy with this helmet. He wears glasses and can get this helmet off easier than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Paully

product_meta.title: Mizuno G4 Youth Samurai Catcher's Helmet
product_meta.description: We've tailored our top selling gear series to fit our Youth players as well, because you deserve the best fit and protection we can provide. Built with the same specs as the samurai adult gear, This gear will hold up to the rigors of your season and help you perform behind the dish.
feature_bullets: Crafted with feedback from the game's top players

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
